data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pfingstl, Tobias (2015): The intertidal Fortuyniidae (Acari: Oribatida): new species, morphological diversity, ecology and biogeography. Zootaxa 3957 (4): 351-382, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.4.1
